title: Photos: Donald Trump's federal indictment
description: Outside the courthouse in Miami, hundreds of Trump's loyalists gathered to rally in support of the former president.

title: Arizona Republicans try and fail to expel Democratic lawmaker over Bible prank
description: Democratic state Rep. Stephanie Stahl Hamilton, who is a minister, was investigated after hiding Bibles in the Arizona House lounge. Republicans narrowly voted to censure – but could not expel – her.

title: Nikola Jokic is an NBA champion, and fans are obsessed with the way he celebrates
description: He's also the king of work life-balance.

title: Tori Bowie, an elite Olympic athlete, died of complications from childbirth
description: An autopsy report underscores the tragedy of Tori Bowie's death at age 32. The 2016 Olympic medalist was eight months pregnant, according to the report.

title: Cormac McCarthy, American novelist of the stark and dark, dies at 89
description: The author of The Road, Blood Meridian and No Country For Old Men embodied a strong Southwestern sensibility, writing often about men grappling with the existence of evil.

title: The Beatles will release a final record, using John Lennon's voice via an AI assist
description: The music has analog roots, recorded by the famous singer-songwriter on a demo tape. Now it's being revived by futuristic technology for release later this year, Paul McCartney said.

title: Ida B. Wells Society internships mired by funding issues, says Nikole Hannah-Jones
description: Journalist Nikole Hannah-Jones says administrative delays have made it impossible to carry on with several academic projects intended to foster the careers of young Black investigative journalists.

title: Cheaper eggs, gas lead inflation lower in May, but higher prices pop up elsewhere
description: Inflation cooled slightly in May, thanks in part to falling gas and egg prices. But the overall cost of living is still climbing faster than the Federal Reserve would like.

title: Volunteer firefighters are getting older. It could be a life-or-death issue
description: With fewer young people joining their local volunteer fire departments, there may not be a fire crew nearby when you need one

title: Trump is set to appear in court after being indicted over classified documents
description: The former president is expected in the federal courthouse in Miami for processing on Tuesday afternoon. Trump faces 37 federal charges, including unlawfully retaining government secrets.

title: Russian missile attack on Ukrainian president's hometown kills at least 6
description: At least six people were killed when Russian missiles hit civilian buildings in an overnight attack Tuesday in the central Ukrainian city of Kryvyi Rih, regional officials said.

title: These millionaires want to tax the rich, and they're lobbying working-class voters
description: A group called Patriotic Millionaires has failed to get Congress to raise their taxes or boost the minimum wage. Now they're taking their concerns about inequality to swing-state voters.

title: The Texas high school that delayed graduation says 100% of seniors are ready to walk
description: "It is graduation delayed, but not denied," Marlin ISD Superintendent Darryl Henson said. He also said that he'll be stepping in as the high school's new principal.

title: Revenge of the killer whales? Recent boat attacks might be driven by trauma
description: The marine mammals have been "attacking" sailboats since 2020. But those encounters are becoming more frequent, and some say the orcas' tactics are evolving.

title: In a time of grief, a stranger's family gave him the ultimate gift
description: Andy Davis honors his heart donor and her family, who gave him the gift of life during a time of intense grief.

title: LGBTQ+ creatives rely on Pride Month income. This year, they're feeling the pinch
description: Brands are rethinking how they nod to Pride after recent boycotts against companies that signal LGBTQ+ support. Influencers who work with brands for Pride now say they're seeing fewer opportunities.

title: A loved one's dementia will break your heart. Don't let it wreck your finances
description: Families can get blindsided by risky behavior with money,  sometimes even before a diagnosis. Having tough conversations and setting up guardrails in advance can help prevent disaster.

title: Actor Treat Williams, star of 'Hair' and 'Everwood', is killed in a motorcycle crash
description: Actor Treat Williams, whose nearly 50-year career included starring roles in the TV series Everwood and the movie Hair, died Monday after a motorcycle crash in Vermont, state police said. He was 71.

title: The Denver Nuggets have won the NBA Finals for the first time in the team's history
description: The Nuggets won four out of the series' five games. Center Nikola Jokić was named the NBA Finals Most Valuable Player.

title: Pat Sajak will retire from 'Wheel of Fortune' after more than 4 decades as host
description: Sajak, 76, has presided over the game show, which features contestants guessing letters to try to fill out words and phrases to win money and prizes, since 1981.
